description:
Zatch is making a new Vulcan 300 when Tia comes over. Elsewhere, Dr. Riddles is depressed over the lost of Kido. Folgore and Kanchome, while in America, decide to visit Dr. Riddles. Once there, the Majestic Twelve ask Folgore to help cheer up Dr. Riddles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Dear Kid, Dr. Riddles` New Vow
Waga Kokoro no Kid, Nazonazo Hakase Aratanaru Chikai
我が心のキッド ナゾナゾ博士新たなる誓い
